Method Detail

merge

public static ISysConfig merge(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                               boolean append,
                               boolean reuse)
                        throws CSysConfigException
Creates a merged configuration (or reuses one).

Parameters:
configManager - The configuration manager that contains all the configurations.
append - This is passed to the merge method of ISysConfig. See there for documentation.
reuse - Reuse a merged configuration that was created in a prior call.
Returns:
a merged configuration.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if a configuration can not be merged.

merge

public static ISysConfig merge(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                               boolean append)
                        throws CSysConfigException
Creates a merged configuration. The created configuration is stored for reusage in merge(ISysConfigManager,boolean,boolean).

Parameters:
configManager - The configuration manager that contains all the configurations.
append - This is passed to the merge method of ISysConfig. See there for documentation.
Returns:
a merged configuration.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if a configuration can not be merged.

mergeAndSetInConfigManager

public static void mergeAndSetInConfigManager(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                                              boolean append)
                                       throws CSysConfigException
Creates a merged configuration using merge(de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.ISysConfigManager, boolean), clears the configuration manager and adds the merged configuration named 'MergedConfig' to the configuration manager.

Parameters:
configManager - The configuration manager that contains all the configurations.
append - This is passed to the merge method of ISysConfig. See there for documentation.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if a configuration can not be merged.

mergeSections

public static ISysConfigItem mergeSections(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                                           String namePattern)
                                    throws CSysConfigException,
                                           CloneNotSupportedException
Calls mergeSections(ISysConfigManager,String,boolean,boolean) where 'exactMatch' is 'true' and 'append' is 'false'.

Parameters:
configManager - The configuration manager that contains all the configurations.
namePattern - This is passed to ISysConfigManager.getItems(java.lang.String, boolean).
Returns:
a merged configuration item.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the configuration can not be merged.
CloneNotSupportedException - if the configuration items can not be cloned.

mergeSections

public static ISysConfigItem mergeSections(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                                           String namePattern,
                                           boolean exactMatch,
                                           boolean append)
                                    throws CSysConfigException,
                                           CloneNotSupportedException
Searches all configurations for the given 'namePattern' (see ISysConfigManager.getItems(java.lang.String, boolean)). Make clones of the found configuration items and merge them together. The merged item is returned. Only section items are merged. Found items of other types are not used for merging. If the 'namePattern' is not found null is returned.

Parameters:
configManager - The configuration manager that contains all the configurations.
namePattern - This is passed to ISysConfigManager.getItems(java.lang.String, boolean).
exactMatch - This is passed to ISysConfigManager.getItems(java.lang.String, boolean).
append - This is passed to ISysConfigItem.merge(de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.ISysConfigItem, boolean).
Returns:
a merged configuration item.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the configuration can not be merged.
CloneNotSupportedException - if the configuration items can not be cloned.
